New Records: Fazalhaq Farooqi completed his maiden five-wicket haul for Afghanistan in international cricket
Key Match Events: Fazalhaq Farooqi's exuberant spell sealed a 125-run win for Afghanistan
Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Ibrahim Zadran's fierce opening partnership propelled Afghanistan to 183/5
Miscellaneous Highlights: The duo also registered 154-run against Uganda to record the second-highest opening stand in the men's T20 World Cup
Others: Uganda's batters struggled to pull off boundaries while Farooqi continued to be economical and rattle wickets
